overview:
Shweta worked at Yahoo, in the US for couple of years before moving back to India and started Criticat. She is a voracious reader, a constant learner and has an extremely positive attitude towards life. She has always been involved with Internet technologies and is a big fan of Linux & other open-source-systems. Before Criticat, she was a key member of Tribal Fusion, an Internet advertisement company in India.

Shweta holds a Masters in Computer Science from University of Southern California.
